skills.title: Data Analysis
skills.description: Led strategic and operational planning for Battalion of 500+ soldiers with $100M+ in equipment. Developed predictive models, managed analytics teams, and built automated reporting systems that enhanced data-driven decision-making across complex military operations and logistics forecasting.

skills.title: C/C++
skills.description: Gained extensive experience in C and C++ by developing embedded systems, focusing on low-level programming and hardware. Applied C, C++, and ARM Assembly language in various projects like a robotic car, automatic pet feeder, and handheld video game device to optimize system performance, manage memory, and implement real-time operations.

skills.title: Web Design
skills.description: Designed and deployed this personal website using Node.JS and React. Deployed this app using AWS Route53 DNS services, an EC2 as a VPS, and Caddy as a Reverse-Proxy. Utilised CSS, HTML, and JS to create a reactive and adaptive website that I plan to scale and introduce blog like content on as I complete more projects.

skills.title: Python/Modeling
skills.description: Utilized Python to solve labs and problems during college coursework, developing strong fundamentals in coding. Built a backend using Python with Flask and DynamoDB for our senior design project, enhancing web development skills and backend design. Currently utilizing PyTorch, Beautiful Soup, and pandas to construct a convolutional neural network (CNN), demonstrating proficiency in machine learning and data processing.

portfolio.title: Personal Website
portfolio.description: Node.JS and React app with HTML and CSS to create personal website. Deployed using AWS Route53 DNS, EC2 VPS, and Caddy reverse-proxy.

portfolio.title: Modeling for Sports Outcomes
portfolio.description: Built end-to-end data pipeline using Python scripting and web scraping to extract NFL game data. Applied statistical analysis with PyTorch, XGBoost, and scikit-learn. Engineered custom features including Elo ratings and rolling averages with automated visualization.

portfolio.title: Deep Learning Image Classifier
portfolio.description: Implemented multiple neural network architectures (Linear, MLP, Deep MLP, Residual networks) using PyTorch for kart racing game object classification achieving 80%+ validation accuracy. Built end-to-end training pipeline with TensorBoard experiment tracking.

portfolio.title: Automatic Pet Feeder
portfolio.description: Embedded systems project using C, C++, and ARM Assembly language. Custom PCB design with 3D printed housing for precise pet food dispensing. Demonstrates low-level programming and hardware integration skills.
